Package org.forgerock.openidm.repo.jdbc.impl

Class DefaultSQLExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.repo.jdbc.impl.DefaultSQLExceptionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SQLExceptionHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DB2SQLExceptionHandler, MSSQLExceptionHandler, MySQLExceptionHandler
public class DefaultSQLExceptionHandler extends Object implements SQLExceptionHandler
Default handler to help handle SQLExceptions across different DB implementations Specific implementations and/or overrides may be needed for a given database supported.
